name: Bourban Glazed Pork Chops
author: Sara Snider
instructions: In small saucepan, mix butter, soy sauce, lemon (cut in half, squeeze juice in, and drop shells in), onion, salt, pepper, Tabasco and bourban. Boil 5 min. - Put pork chops in casserole dish, pour sauce over, bake at 325Â° for 1 hour (on 1 1/2hr) until done.
